Additionally to GC frustration this is like 1 second work, 5 seconds freeze.

I was in flight, back to VAB, back to SPC, launchpad, go, back to VAB, back to SPC, launchpad, from there to VAB, now this.

(First going to launchpad and from there choosing to go to VAB instead of directly going to VAB is a workaround to avoid the "Procedural Thrust Plate <-> gap <-> Procedural Tank" issue, btw)
